CustomField.description: Use this option to change the question element style of survey responder interface. Use standard CSS style. e.g. color: #445566;font-size: 20px.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Question Element Style allows you to customize the visual style of the question elements in the survey responder interface. You can use this option to apply CSS styles. e.g. color: #445566;font-size: 20px.
CustomField.label: Question Element Style
